about_the_game:
Trapped in an endless labyrinth of neon, Elias Nova wished he’d played Super 3D Maze 16 during his astronaut trainings.  Unfortunately, all he had was Pong, so it’ll be up to you, intrepid gamer, to guide Elias through these mazes in search of a way out.  Perhaps you can even figure out why he’s in this colorful purgatory to begin with.  Just don’t try to ask Elias what’s happening.  Poor guy doesn’t have a clue.

As if being trapped in a maze wasn’t enough, some cheeky devil’s gone around locking all the doors.  If you want to help Elias escape, you’re gonna have to hunt down those keys to open up new pathways.  But be wary.  The labyrinth holds deadly perils that can undo your progress in the blink of an eye.  How many lasers does it take to kill Elias Nova?  Well, really just the one, so you’d be wise to avoid em.

What’s better than one massive labyrinth?  Labyrinths made up of other labyrinths, of course!  So with the practical application of portals, Super 3D Maze 16 gives you mazes within mazes.  Elias’s sense of direction wasn’t the best to begin with, so he’ll need your help to keep track of all the twists and turns if he’s ever gonna make it out of this.

But really, what’s a labyrinth for if not exploring?  That’s the job Elias signed up for, even before he got plucked out of his own reality and into the mysterious world of Super 3D Maze 16.  He’s got the plucky determination and stalwart resolve to keep wandering these lonely neon halls for as long as it takes to get some answers.  The only question is, do you?
detailed_description:
Trapped in an endless labyrinth of neon, Elias Nova wished he’d played Super 3D Maze 16 during his astronaut trainings.  Unfortunately, all he had was Pong, so it’ll be up to you, intrepid gamer, to guide Elias through these mazes in search of a way out.  Perhaps you can even figure out why he’s in this colorful purgatory to begin with.  Just don’t try to ask Elias what’s happening.  Poor guy doesn’t have a clue.

As if being trapped in a maze wasn’t enough, some cheeky devil’s gone around locking all the doors.  If you want to help Elias escape, you’re gonna have to hunt down those keys to open up new pathways.  But be wary.  The labyrinth holds deadly perils that can undo your progress in the blink of an eye.  How many lasers does it take to kill Elias Nova?  Well, really just the one, so you’d be wise to avoid em.

What’s better than one massive labyrinth?  Labyrinths made up of other labyrinths, of course!  So with the practical application of portals, Super 3D Maze 16 gives you mazes within mazes.  Elias’s sense of direction wasn’t the best to begin with, so he’ll need your help to keep track of all the twists and turns if he’s ever gonna make it out of this.

But really, what’s a labyrinth for if not exploring?  That’s the job Elias signed up for, even before he got plucked out of his own reality and into the mysterious world of Super 3D Maze 16.  He’s got the plucky determination and stalwart resolve to keep wandering these lonely neon halls for as long as it takes to get some answers.  The only question is, do you?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please wear headphones to fully appreciate this experience.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please wear headphones to fully appreciate this experience.

name: Super 3D Maze 16

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please wear headphones to fully appreciate this experience.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please wear headphones to fully appreciate this experience.
